content.question: Ryan quit a job with a daily salary and opened a business. On a daily basis, the total revenue of the business is <math alttext="$200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the explicit costs of the business are <math alttext="$120" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>120</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. If Ryan has zero economic profits, what must be the value of Ryanâ€™s implicit costs?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
